_metadata.description: Template schema for resume-openfont LaTeX template with character limits

experience_bullets.note: Each bullet can span multiple lines at 116 chars per line

projects_description.note: Descriptions can span multiple lines at 116 chars per line

skills.note: Skills CANNOT wrap to multiple lines - must fit in single line

education.degree: MSc Data Science and Machine Learning
education.modules: Supervised Learning; Graphical Models; Bayesian Deep Learning; NLP; Reinforcement Learning;
education.additional:
ML Seminar (Modern ML techniques); Dissertation on Gaussian Processes with Boundary Conditions (using stohastic differential equations) -
\textbf{Distinction achieved, 80\% in thesis}

education.modules: Microeconomics; Macroeconomics; Advanced Econometrics; Economic Theory and Analysis
education.additional: \textbf{Overall 2:1 (68\%); with 1:1 Dissertation on Inequality and Immobility in a Referral Economy}

bullets: Wrote the solana shim contract (V2) for the liquidity layer
Rewrote all typescript tests in rust for the contract
Solely responsible for building a Solana indexer using novel methods for decoding and efficiently indexing swaps and pools. Minimal memory usage and low latency were vital.
Coding the ledger (Rust), writing docs + specs (MDx + JS), improving testing (Rust and ShellScript), Developing the sdk. Wrote articles: https://shorturl.at/Yjibn, https://shorturl.at/lcRD3
Devised solution using \textbf{VBA} and \textbf{SQL} to flag potential wash trade activity, compressing 16 hrs -> 20 seconds
Created fully automated communication API in \textbf{Python}, with frontend in \textbf{React JS}

projects.name: MSc Thesis: GP regression with Boundary Conditions
projects.description: Used the duality between a special type of Stochastic Partial Differential Equations (SPDE) and the Gaussian Process (GP) Regression in order to form a kernel that is able to take boundary conditions into account, for up to 3-D space.

projects.name: Implementation of ADMMBO
projects.description: Implemented a 2020 paper that proposed a novel method of optimising unknown functions with unknown constraints using Gaussian Processes setups and iterative techniques.

projects.name: End-to-end sentence simplifier (NLP)
projects.description: End-to-end implementation for competitively simplifying text using a combination of recursive bi-directional neural networks, linear neural networks, bag-of-words, and PCA

projects.name: Risk Premium Calculator
projects.description: Generates a non-approximated risk-premium matrix for any number of players using the Independent Chip Model (ICM) calculations. Implemented in python and rust.

row1.left_value: Rust, Python, Solidity, Cairo, Bash, VBA, SQL, JS/TS
row1.right_value: Tokio, Deadpool, Pandas, TensorFlow, JAX, Gpytorch
